AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States: country with constitution protecting individuals from unreasonable searches and seizures
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Texas: state with constitution protecting individuals from unreasonable searches and seizures and location of court proceedings
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Texas Court of Criminal Appeals: court that has made rulings on roving border patrol stops, establishing standards for reasonable suspicion
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.area near the Texas-Mexico border: region relevant to the case of Carlos Martinez-Romero, with guidelines limiting reasonable proximity to stops conducted within fifty miles of the border
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.U.S.-Mexico border: border region relevant to smuggling activities and vehicle stops, also the location of a vehicle stop in Carlos Martinez-Romero's case
